TopicTitle: Help to find mods with cargo bays

Articles.Content:
Hey guys and gals!

Looking for a bit of help! I want to build a transport/cargo spaceship that'll carry stuff to Duna and beyond, or even just up to a space station. But here lies my problem, I would normally use B9 Aerospace but that has not been updated and I'm hearing its very unstable so don't want to chance using it so I'm looking for alternatives...

Anybody got any ideas/suggestions?
You could use Nertea's Mark IV Spaceplane System. Or simply use TweakScale to rescale existing Mk2 and 3 bays.
